name: Flow by Night
description:
"Flow by night" is a short experiemental game by me, created after feeling rather burned out by my university project.

With a simplistic but special movement system you control a single spark in a dark cold world, beeing the only light source in reach. Your motion fights against the consuming darkness of the night while you slowly find your way through the snowy field...

Enjoy :) And I'm open for feedback!
